posts.content:
Be very choosy when deciding on people with whom to share and what to share. You may give your weapon to them to hurt you.

Be very careful.

comments.commentText: Your insight on the importance of discerning whom to trust resonates deeply. In our interconnected world, safeguarding our vulnerabilities is crucial to maintaining our well-being. Thank you for sharing such a powerful reminder.

posts.content:
The Golden SDR Rule: If it takes X amount of calls/emails to hit quota...

Do more than X.

URGENT: Seeking Elite AE Hunters for Game-Changing Startup (2025)

Hope everyone's crushing it in 2025! I'm on an urgent mission to build a founding sales team.

What We Need:
5 Account Executives with proven startup experience
Locations: Bay Area preferred (also considering Boston, NYC, Seattle, and Austin ( major tech hubs)
Must have hunter DNA and startup success stories
Business application sales experience required (fintech experience a plus)

The Opportunity:
Be part of the founding sales team at a heavily funded venture
Work with industry-leading executives and top-tier investors
Groundbreaking product with massive market potential

Compensation:
Base: $130-150k+ (flexibility for exceptional candidates)
Minimum commission guarantee: $12,500 (even on smallest deals)
Commission example: $26k on $100k deal
Substantial equity package

Ideal Candidate:
4+ years of enterprise sales experience ( NEED TO BE A HUNTER)
Proven track record in startup environments
Comfortable selling to SMB accounts initially <-------
Hungry for high growth and equity upside

This is a rare opportunity to join a well-funded startup at the ground floor with an incredibly attractive compensation structure.

If you or anyone in your network is talented hunters who love being the 1st in and want to make their make their mark, please connect us ASAP. Let's talk!
DM me for details!

The chance to work with industry-leading executives and a groundbreaking product is truly compelling. I'll definitely spread the word within my network and keep an eye out for talented individuals who fit the bill.
Rich, call me. I've got some of the guys you are looking for and want o hear more!:) I Hope everyone is off to 2025 with a Bang!

posts.content:
ùêÅùêûùê¨ùê≠ ùêöùêßùêù ùêñùê®ùê´ùê¨ùê≠ 
hashtag
#AI ùêÉùê¢ùê†ùê¢ùê≠ùêöùê• ùêìùê´ùêöùêßùê¨ùêüùê®ùê´ùê¶ùêöùê≠ùê¢ùê®ùêß ùêèùê´ùêöùêúùê≠ùê¢ùêúùêûùê¨ 
Digital transformation is a journey, not a destination. As organizations race to adopt
and modern technologies, many find themselves navigating both triumphs and tribulations. According to Gartner, three of the top six challenges with digital transformation revolve around organizational structures, culture, and leadership capabilities. At, we‚Äôve seen the remarkable potential of
, and we‚Äôve also seen the costly mistakes businesses make when implementing it. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre here to share the best practices to drive successful transformation, alongside the painful pitfalls to avoid.

1. Empower People, Address Their Fears
Your people are your greatest allies in transformation. Help them embrace change by addressing their concerns about AI replacing jobs, disrupting control, or altering workflows. Empowered employees drive innovation.

2. Start Small, Fail Fast, Learn Faster
Break large projects into manageable six-month models to test and adapt quickly. This approach minimizes risk, controls costs, and ensures you‚Äôre consistently delivering value.

3. Prioritize Data Management
Data is the backbone of AI. Start by acknowledging its current state, no matter how messy, and implement strategies to clean and manage it. Strong data practices lead to stronger AI outcomes.

4. Balance Build, Buy, and Fine-Tune Approaches
Avoid over-relying on one strategy. A balanced approach, such as 30% buy, 40% fine-tune, and 30% build, provides flexibility and aligns solutions to your needs.

5. Think of Transformation as a Marathon
AI transformation is a long-term commitment. Set realistic expectations, pace your initiatives, and prepare for continuous evolution.

6. Measure Progress and Outcomes
"If you want it, measure it. If you can‚Äôt measure it, forget it." Consistent evaluation ensures your AI investments are driving measurable results.

Common Mistakes to Avoid
Neglecting the physical world in AI transformation overlooks its impact on offline operations like manufacturing and logistics, while over-relying on external companies compromises ownership and strategic control. Resistance to changing business models limits AI's potential to innovate processes and customer experiences. Adding AI as a patch rather than integrating it holistically can harm customer trust, and restricting AI to IT departments prevents its full potential as a cross-functional business enabler.

At, we‚Äôre passionate about helping businesses embrace AI and avoid the missteps that hinder progress. Let‚Äôs transform the future, together.

posts.name:
Business Development - The Missing Link Between Marketing & Sales - 540,000 Members Strong
Business Development - The Missing Link Between Marketing & Sales - 540,000 Members Strong
posts.content:
Why I stopped chasing life hacks and embraced hard work.

I used to be obsessed with shortcuts.

Every ‚Äúhack‚Äù that promised to save time or boost productivity had my attention. And while some worked, I realized something critical:

Hacks can only take you so far.

Here‚Äôs the difference I‚Äôve learned:
1. Life Hacks: Quick fixes that give instant results but lack depth and long-term impact.
2. Think: Skimming the surface, solving the symptom‚Äînot the root cause.
3. Hard Work: The road that requires patience, dedication, and grit.

It‚Äôs slower, but it builds resilience, mastery, and results that last.

While hacks might save you minutes, hard work creates a foundation for growth and success.

Which path are you choosing?

Ô∏è Repost this to inspire someone to embrace the road less traveled today.

comments.commentText: Small disciplines repeated every day compound in to enormous success.

posts.name:
Tanvi Chaturvedi
Tanvi Chaturvedi
posts.content:
ùêèùêÆùê´ùê©ùê®ùê¨ùêû ùê®ùêü ùêÇùêÉùêí ùêïùê¢ùêûùê∞ùê¨ ùê¢ùêß ùêíùêÄùêè ùêí/ùüí ùêáùêÄùêçùêÄ 

1.Legacy Compatibility 
CDS views are used to convert obsolete SAP tables for compatibility with S/4 HANA. They ensure that programs still work smoothly even if the underlying tables are no longer in use.

Refresh & Regeneration 
Sometimes, the data in these CDS views needs to be refreshed, ensuring that the program functions correctly. This process is typically done once after implementing your new SAP S/4 HANA system.

3.Initial System Setup Ô∏è
SAP recommends running this regeneration process during the first setup of your S/4 HANA system to refresh all obsolete tables converted to CDS views.

4.Custom Fields Integration Ô∏è
CDS views are also essential when adding custom fields through ABAP, enabling enhanced functionality in your system.

By using CDS views, SAP ensures smooth integration and performance with your legacy data while leveraging new functionalities.

comments.commentText: Thank you, Tanvi, for breaking down the purpose of CDS Views in such a clear and structured way. It's impressive how they bridge the gap between legacy systems and modern functionality, ensuring seamless integration and enhanced performance. Your expertise truly makes complex concepts approachable.
Thank you, Tanvi, for breaking down the purpose of CDS Views in such a clear and structured way
